en: things falling out in big quantity

ngiemboon: À gɔɔ̌n né mèŋ ngie: «Tóo ḿpfɛɛ́ péli.»
Alaʼ gie tsetsáʼ aa wɔ mboŋo mmo tɛʼ, melɛk pɔ melwo ŋwáʼ wɔ wo tɛʼ
en: a land where the soil is very fertile, where milk and honey are abundant

ngiemboon: Pi zsě ngie mèŋ n ge tá gẅi
en: You know that I am your father

ngiemboon: !Pi zsé ngie mèŋ n ge tá gẅi!
en: Know that I am your father!
He said: “What am I doing?” or He said: “What shall I do?”

ngiemboon: Mɔɔ̌n lɔɔ̌n nnáʼ mesaŋá lê: sésɔg, ngwáŋ ńgÿo shʉ́shÿó
en: My mother made couscous sauce with pepper, salt, and eggplant

ngiemboon: À cǔa múɔ; à te lʉa; ńtí nue à zsě mmó gie à gÿo
en: He hit the child; he didn’t cry because he knows what he did

ngiemboon: À gɔɔ̌n né mèŋ ngie: «Manzwě wɔɔ̀n gɔɔ̌n ngie: “Tóo ḿpfɛɛ́ péli.”»
en: He told me: “My wife said: ‘Come eat the peanut.’”

ngiemboon: à zsě mmó gie à gÿo
en: because he knows what he did

ngiemboon: à gɔɔ̌n né mèŋ ngie: «Tóo ḿpfɛɛ́ péli.»
en: he said to me: “Come eat peanuts.”
